entries.journal_entry_description: The Sayormi people have begun to advance on the people of Kerritamba village. Scattered attempts at slaughtering hunting parties pepper the daily news floating about the Kerritamba people and their quiet, peaceful village. 'It is time to strike back', you remember Meust saying in the usual calm Kerritamba manner. To set the score, you'll need to find 7 Sayormi necklaces from the roaming Sayormi in the Dead Forest.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Collect 7 Sayormi Necklaces and return to Meust.
